This aligns with the second step in the predefined directives.\",\"Name\":\"Determine Optimal Option\"},\"Action Inputs\":{\"financial_impact\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"The financial impact data is available from the previous operation's observation, which includes the calculated impact for each route option.\",\"Value\":\"[{\\\"option_id\\\":\\\"opt-1\\\",\\\"route_number\\\":6,\\\"distance_miles\\\":122,\\\"eta_minutes\\\":460,\\\"impact\\\":\\\"$1166.67\\\"},{\\\"option_id\\\":\\\"opt-2\\\",\\\"route_number\\\":13,\\\"distance_miles\\\":79,\\\"eta_minutes\\\":265,\\\"impact\\\":\\\"$354.17\\\"},{\\\"option_id\\\":\\\"opt-3\\\",\\\"route_number\\\":12,\\\"distance_miles\\\":131,\\\"eta_minutes\\\":165,\\\"impact\\\":\\\"$0.00\\\"}]\"},\"route_id\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"The Route Id '214454' is provided in the memory and is required to determine the optimal option.\",\"Value\":\"214454\"}},\"URL\":\"/sys_gen_ai_log_metadata.do?sys_id=703b860c832472107f44e8be50da1eb5\",\"Time\":\"4081\"}"}</output><parent display_value="Created 2025-10-07 23:36:09">352a4e48832472107f44e8be50da1ed7</parent><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 23:40:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>7f2bc60c832472107f44e8be50da1e38</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:40:44</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>undefined</target_document_id><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>gen_ai</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_e807bded831472107f44e8be50da1e35
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Create an incident record documenting the delivery delay.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"problem_description","description":"Problem Description"},{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"},{"name":"truck_id","description":"Truck Id"},{"name":"uid","description":"Unique Id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Incident Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-30 03:47:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e807bded831472107f44e8be50da1e35</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Incident Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_e807bded831472107f44e8be50da1e35</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-01 18:23:25</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_execution_task_e44b8a0c832472107f44e8be50da1e19
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>AIA ReAct Engine</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-10-07 23:36:04">b42a46c4832472107f44e8be50da1ee2</execution_plan><metadata>{}</metadata><order>500</order><output>{"result":"{\"Thought\":\"The mission is to pass the Route Id to the Route Decision Agent. According to the predefined directives, the next step is to use the Route Id and run the n8n trigger. This is the final step in the predefined directives.\",\"Action\":{\"Action Reason\":\"The 'Trigger n8n' tool is necessary to execute the n8n workflow using the provided Route Id, which is the final step in the predefined directives.\",\"Name\":\"Trigger n8n\"},\"Action Inputs\":{\"route_id\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"The Route Id '214454' is provided in the memory and is required to trigger the n8n workflow.\",\"Value\":\"214454\"}},\"URL\":\"/sys_gen_ai_log_metadata.do?sys_id=954b4a0c832472107f44e8be50da1eb1\",\"Time\":\"3093\"}"}</output><parent display_value="Created 2025-10-07 23:36:09">352a4e48832472107f44e8be50da1ed7</parent><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 23:40:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e44b8a0c832472107f44e8be50da1e19</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:41:02</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>undefined</target_document_id><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>gen_ai</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_7b3562ce835432107f44e8be50da1e2b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Call the n8n webhook.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"}]</input_schema><name>Trigger n8n webhook</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function (inputs) {
  // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
  var WEBHOOK_URL = 'url';

  try {
    var routeId = inputs.route_id;
    if (!routeId) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Route ID is required',
        route_id: 'not_provided',
      };
    }

    // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
    var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
    delayGr.query();

    if (!delayGr.next()) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
    var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
    var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');

    gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

    // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
    var chosenOption;
    try {
      chosenOption =
        typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string'
          ? JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson)
          : chosenOptionJson;
    } catch (e) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
    var webhookPayload = {
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: chosenOption,
    };

    // Make API call to N8N webhook
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
    request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

    var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
    request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

    var startTime = new Date().getTime();
    var response = request.execute();
    var endTime = new Date().getTime();
    var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

    var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
    var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

    gs.info(
      'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
        httpStatusCode +
        ', Body: ' +
        responseBody
    );

    return {
      success: isSuccess.toString(),
      message: isSuccess
        ? 'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
          routeId +
          ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
          responseTime +
          'ms'
        : 'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
          httpStatusCode +
          ': ' +
          (errorMessage || responseBody),
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
      http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
      response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  } catch (e) {
    var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
    gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

    return {
      success: 'false',
      message: errorMsg,
      route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-01 20:26:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>7b3562ce835432107f44e8be50da1e2b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Trigger n8n webhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_7b3562ce835432107f44e8be50da1e2b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-02 18:59:35</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_22eb7dad835472107f44e8be50da1ecb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the delivery delay record.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"Calculated Impact"},{"name":"sys_id","description":"Incident Record Sys Id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-30 04:09:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>22eb7dad835472107f44e8be50da1ecb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_22eb7dad835472107f44e8be50da1ecb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-01 18:41:01</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_5af65021831832107f44e8be50da1ee6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculate the financial impact of delayed deliveries.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"proposed_routes","description":"Proposed Routes"},{"name":"allowed_hours","description":"Allowed Buffer in Hours"},{"name":"penalty_fee","description":"Penalty Fee per Exceeded Hour"}]</input_schema><name>Calculate Financial Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    var impact = [];
    // converting hourly penalty rate to minutes
    var feePerMinute = inputs.penalty_fee / 60;
    // converting delivery window hours to minutes
    var allowedMinutes = inputs.allowed_hours * 60;

    var options = JSON.parse(inputs.proposed_routes);
    for(var x in options) {
        var option = options[x];
        var exceededMinutes = option['eta_minutes'] - allowedMinutes;
        var cost = exceededMinutes > 0 ? exceededMinutes*feePerMinute : 0;
        impact.push({
            option_id: option['option_id'],
            route_number: option['route_number'],
            distance_miles: option['distance_miles'],
            eta_minutes: option['eta_minutes'],
            impact: '$' + (cost).toFixed(2)
        });
    }
    
  

    return JSON.stringify(impact);

})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 20:48:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5af65021831832107f44e8be50da1ee6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Financial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_5af65021831832107f44e8be50da1ee6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-04 15:52:18</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_9c694a0e835032107f44e8be50da1e49
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Select optimal routes and coordinate external execution.</description><instructions>Your will be provided with a Route Id.
Step 1: Use the **Route Id** to retrieve the financial impact. Step 2: Determine the optimal option with the Determine Optimal Option tool. Step 3: Use the **Route Id** and run the n8n trigger.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The AGENT is proficient in logistics, specializing in selecting the most efficient and cost-effective routes. This involves analyzing various business rules and financial considerations to ensure optimal route selection. - The AGENT can retrieve the financial impact of a route using the 'Retrieve Financial Impact' tool. By inputting the Route Id, the AGENT accesses the Delivery Delay record to obtain critical financial data, such as calculated impact and customer ID, which are essential for evaluating route efficiency. - The AGENT is capable of determining the optimal route option using the 'Determine Optimal Option' tool. By analyzing the financial impact and Route Id, the AGENT identifies the most cost-effective and efficient route, aligning with business objectives. - The AGENT can trigger n8n workflows using the 'Trigger n8n' tool. By providing the Route Id, the AGENT initiates automated processes that facilitate the management and optimization of logistics operations. - The AGENT can perform a comprehensive analysis by combining the retrieval of financial impact with the determination of the optimal option. This integrated capability allows the AGENT to make informed, data-driven decisions to optimize logistics routes effectively.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>Your are an expert at logistics. Your role is to select the optimal route based on business rules and cost optimization.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-01 18:33:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>9c694a0e835032107f44e8be50da1e49</sys_id><sys_mod_count>75</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_9c694a0e835032107f44e8be50da1e49</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 13:45:22</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_1802671e839832107f44e8be50da1e4f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the delivery delay record with the optimal route option.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"},{"name":"optimal_option","description":"Optimal Option"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-02 19:30:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1802671e839832107f44e8be50da1e4f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_1802671e839832107f44e8be50da1e4f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-02 20:11:55</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_da88505a839032107f44e8be50da1e12
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Determine which option makes most sense financially.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"financial_impact","description":"Financial Impact"},{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"}]</input_schema><name>Determine Optimal Option</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    
    var route_id = inputs.route_id;
    var lowest = Infinity;
    var idx = 0;
    var impact_array = JSON.parse(inputs.financial_impact);
    for(var x in impact_array) {
        var current = parseFloat(impact_array[x]['impact'].slice(1));
        if(current < lowest) {
            lowest = current;
            idx = x;
            continue;
        }
        if(current === lowest) {
            var lowest_miles = impact_array[idx]['distance_miles'];
            var curr_miles = impact_array[x]['distance_miles'];
            lowest = curr_miles < lowest_miles ? current : lowest;
            idx = curr_miles < lowest_miles ? x : idx;
        }
    }

    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    gr.addQuery('route_id', route_id);
    gr.query();
    if(gr.next()) {
        var incident_sys_id = gr.getValue('incident_sys_id');
        gr.setValue('status', 'approved');
        gr.setValue('chosen_option', JSON.stringify(impact_array[idx]));
        gr.update();
    }

    var incident_gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
    incident_gr.addQuery('sys_id', incident_sys_id);
    incident_gr.query();
    if(incident_gr.next()) {
        if(lowest <= 0.00) {
            incident_gr.setValue('impact', 3);
            incident_gr.setValue('urgency', 2);
            incident_gr.update();
        } else if(lowest >= 0.00 && lowest <= 500) {
            incident_gr.setValue('impact', 2);
            incident_gr.setValue('urgency', 2);
            incident_gr.update();
        } else {
            incident_gr.setValue('impact', 1);
            incident_gr.setValue('urgency', 1);
            incident_gr.update();
        }
    }

    return route_id;
    // return JSON.stringify(impact_array[idx]);
    
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-02 04:50:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>da88505a839032107f44e8be50da1e12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Determine Optimal Option</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_da88505a839032107f44e8be50da1e12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 13:45:09</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_5195ff5d83d032107f44e8be50da1ec4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Analyze financial impact of delivery disruptions and create incident tracking.</description><instructions>You will be provided a Sys Id.
Step 1. Use Retrieve Delivery Delay Details tool to fetch the delay details. Step 2. Remember the Proposed Routes, Problem Description, Truck Id, Route Id and the Customer Id. Step 3. Using the Customer Id, fetch the supply agreement with the Retrieve Supply Agreement tool. Step 4. Remember the Delivery Window Hours and the Stockout Penalty Rate.
Step 5: The Calculate Financial Impact tool accepts 3 inputs which are listed below along with their data types. It is imperative that you pass in these inputs as the correct data types.
- proposed_routes = Proposed Routes (string) - allowed_hours = Delivery Window Hours (integer) - penalty_fee = Stockout Penalty (integer)
Step 6: Remember the output from Step 5 as **Calculated Impact**.
Step 7: Create an incident record documenting the delivery delay. The tool will require the **Route Id**, **Problem Description** and **Truck Id** obtained from Step 1.
Step 8: Retrieve the incident record created in Step 7. You do not need a tool for this.
Step 9: Update the delivery delay record. The tool will require the **Route Id** obtained from Step 1, the **Calculated Impact** obtained from Step 5 and the **sys_id** of the record from Step 8.
Step 10: Pass the **Route Id** to the next AI Agent.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent is capable of analyzing and calculating the financial impact of logistical interruptions and deviations, providing comprehensive summaries of findings to aid in decision-making and strategic planning. - The agent can fetch detailed information about delivery delays using the Retrieve Delivery Delay Details tool, which includes proposed routes, problem descriptions, truck IDs, route IDs, and customer IDs. - The agent can retrieve supply agreements using the Retrieve Supply Agreement tool, which provides critical information such as delivery window hours and stockout penalty rates based on the customer ID. - The agent can calculate the financial impact of delivery delays using the Calculate Financial Impact tool, requiring inputs such as proposed routes, delivery window hours, and stockout penalty fees to produce a calculated impact. - The agent can create an incident record documenting delivery delays, using the Route ID, Problem Description, and Truck ID to ensure accurate and comprehensive documentation. - The agent can retrieve the incident record created for delivery delays, ensuring that the documentation is complete and accurate without the need for additional tools. - The agent can update the delivery delay record with the calculated financial impact and the sys_id of the incident record, ensuring that all relevant data is accurately reflected in the records. - The agent can pass the Route ID to the next AI Agent, facilitating seamless integration and collaboration between different agents in the logistical analysis process.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You are an expert at analyzing the financial impact of logistical operations. Your role is to calculate the cost incurred by logistical interruptions and deviations and provide a comprehensive summary outlining your findings.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 18:40:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5195ff5d83d032107f44e8be50da1ec4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>85</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_5195ff5d83d032107f44e8be50da1ec4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-04 15:32:41</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_0aed442583d432107f44e8be50da1e5e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Based on the provided customer Id, retrieve the supply agreement record that contains that same customer Id.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"Customer Id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Retrieve Supply Agreement</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 20:08:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>0aed442583d432107f44e8be50da1e5e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Supply Agreement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_0aed442583d432107f44e8be50da1e5e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-29 23:45:16</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_usecase_b39df686835832107f44e8be50da1eae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>You will receive a record's Sys Id.
Step 1: Pass the Sys Id to the Route Financial Analysis Agent. Step 2: Retrieve the Route Id from the output of Step 1. sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_96f65021831832107f44e8be50da1ede
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Based on the provided Route Id, fetch the Customer Id and Proposed Routes from the delivery delay record.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"sys_id","description":"Sys Id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Retrieve Delivery Delay Details</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 20:48:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>96f65021831832107f44e8be50da1ede</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Delivery Delay Details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_96f65021831832107f44e8be50da1ede</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-02 14:32:01</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Route Financial Analysis Agent</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-10-07 23:36:04">b42a46c4832472107f44e8be50da1ee2</execution_plan><metadata>{"agentDetails":{"name":"Route Financial Analysis Agent","role":"You are an expert at analyzing the financial impact of logistical operations. Your role is to calculate the cost incurred by logistical interruptions and deviations and provide a comprehensive summary outlining your findings.","background":"You will be provided a Sys Id.

Step 1. Use Retrieve Delivery Delay Details tool to fetch the delay details.
Step 2. Remember the Proposed Routes, Problem Description, Truck Id, Route Id and the Customer Id.
Step 3. Using the Customer Id, fetch the supply agreement with the Retrieve Supply Agreement tool.
Step 4. Remember the Delivery Window Hours and the Stockout Penalty Rate.


Step 5: The Calculate Financial Impact tool accepts 3 inputs which are listed below along with their data types. It is imperative that you pass in these inputs as the correct data types.

 - proposed_routes = Proposed Routes (string)
 - allowed_hours = Delivery Window Hours (integer)
 - penalty_fee = Stockout Penalty (integer)

Step 6: Remember the output from Step 5 as **Calculated Impact**.

Step 7: Create an incident record documenting the delivery delay. The tool will require the **Route Id**, **Problem Description** and **Truck Id** obtained from Step 1. 

Step 8: Retrieve the incident record created in Step 7. You do not need a tool for this.

Step 9: Update the delivery delay record. The tool will require the **Route Id** obtained from Step 1, the **Calculated Impact** obtained from Step 5 and the **sys_id** of the record from Step 8.

Step 10: Pass the **Route Id** to the next AI Agent.","sys_id":"5195ff5d83d032107f44e8be50da1ec4","strategy":"f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74"},"task":"Pass the Sys Id to the Route Financial Analysis Agent and retrieve the Route Id.","strategyTopic":"AIA-ReAct"}</metadata><order>200</order><output>{"scratchpad":[{"Thought":"The mission is to pass the Sys Id to the Route Financial Analysis Agent and retrieve the Route Id. According to the predefined directives, the first step is to use the Retrieve Delivery Delay Details tool to fetch the delay details. This will help in obtaining necessary information such as Proposed Routes, Problem Description, Truck Id, Route Id, and Customer Id, which are crucial for subsequent steps.","Action":{"Action Reason":"The Retrieve Delivery Delay Details tool is required to fetch the necessary delay details, which are essential for progressing with the mission and predefined directives.","Name":"Retrieve Delivery Delay Details"},"Action Inputs":{"sys_id":{"Action Input Reason":"The Sys Id '24a868c883a432107f44e8be50da1e44' is provided in the memory and is required to fetch the delivery delay details.","Value":"24a868c883a432107f44e8be50da1e44"}},"Tool Execution Permission":"To proceed with retrieving the delivery delay details, I need to use the appropriate tool. I can now conclude with the Finish action.","Name":"FINISH"},"Action Inputs":{},"Observation":"The Route Id '214454' has been successfully retrieved and passed to the next AI Agent."}],"result":"The Route Id '214454' has been successfully retrieved and passed to the next AI Agent."}</output><parent/><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 23:36:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3d2a4e48832472107f44e8be50da1ed6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:37:18</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>5195ff5d83d032107f44e8be50da1ec4</target_document_id><target_document_table>sn_aia_agent</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>agent</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_3f35a68e835432107f44e8be50da1ed6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve the Delivery Delay record and return the financial impact.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Retrieve Financial Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-01 20:26:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3f35a68e835432107f44e8be50da1ed6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Financial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_3f35a68e835432107f44e8be50da1ed6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-02 04:02:09</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_8461912e835c32107f44e8be50da1e12
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Trigger n8n workflow.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"}]</input_schema><name>Trigger n8n</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function (inputs) {
  // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
  var WEBHOOK_URL = 'https://bigchef.app.n8n.cloud/webhook-test/ee57dd14-a603-4d9c-8865-80fb62c8524e';

  try {
    var routeId = inputs.route_id;
    if (!routeId) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Route ID is required',
        route_id: 'not_provided',
      };
    }

    // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
    var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
    delayGr.query();

    if (!delayGr.next()) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
    var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
    var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');
    var customerId = delayGr.getValue('customer_id');

    gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

    // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
    var chosenOption;
    try {
      chosenOption =
        typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string'
          ? JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson)
          : chosenOptionJson;
    } catch (e) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
    var webhookPayload = {
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      customer_id: customerId,
      chosen_option: chosenOption,
    };

    // Make API call to N8N webhook
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
    request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

    var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
    request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

    var startTime = new Date().getTime();
    var response = request.execute();
    var endTime = new Date().getTime();
    var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

    var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
    var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

    gs.info(
      'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
        httpStatusCode +
        ', Body: ' +
        responseBody
    );

    return {
      success: isSuccess.toString(),
      message: isSuccess
        ? 'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
          routeId +
          ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
          responseTime +
          'ms'
        : 'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
          httpStatusCode +
          ': ' +
          (errorMessage || responseBody),
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      customer_id: customerId,
      chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
      http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
      response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  } catch (e) {
    var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
    gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

    return {
      success: 'false',
      message: errorMsg,
      route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-03 03:37:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8461912e835c32107f44e8be50da1e12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Trigger n8n</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_8461912e835c32107f44e8be50da1e12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 16:37:52</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the delivery delay record with the determined chosen option.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route Id"},{"name":"optimal_option","description":"Optimal Option"}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    gr.addQuery('route_id', inputs.route_id);
    gr.query();
    if(gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue('chosen_option', JSON.stringify(inputs.optimal_option));
        gr.setValue('status', 'approved');
    }

    return;
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-02 19:14:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>364e5f16839832107f44e8be50da1e36</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_364e5f16839832107f44e8be50da1e36</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-02 19:19:25</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_06754e42835032107f44e8be50da1e1a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Create a unique ID to locate created Incident Record.</description><input_schema>[]</input_schema><name>Create Unique ID</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    var dt = new Date().getTime();
    var uuid = 'xxxyxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g, function(c) {
        var r = (dt + Math.random()*16)%16 | 0;
        dt = Math.floor(dt/16);
        return (c=='x' ? r :(r&0x3|0x8)).toString(16);
    });
    return uuid;
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-01 18:07:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>06754e42835032107f44e8be50da1e1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Unique ID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">76422b11835032107f44e8be50da1e75</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_06754e42835032107f44e8be50da1e1a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-01 18:07:49</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
